CON[COMMENT: AREA: UI; REF-ID: 394347; NOTE: label for the player's condition (CON, for Overall Condition) ]

Overall Physical Condition represents the player's level of fitness. If he is fatigued, recently recovered from injury or just unfit he will have a low Overall Physical Condition rating. Playing matches when this is low risks injury as well as an even lower rating in future. Only rest from matches and/or training can help a player to recover.[COMMENT: hint explanation for Overall Conditioning label, use top ten matches, change to ID 396172 to add context]
